title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of nice quality, with a thick knit material that's very soft and warm. They like its style, with one customer noting it looks and feels expensive, and appreciate that it has a perfect fit. However, customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it runs small. Moreover, several customers report issues with the sleeves not staying in place.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Very nice true to size , thick material Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality and really soft!
items.body: I’m actually surprised at the quality of this sweater for the price. It looks and feels expensive, as if it’s from a luxury brand. It’s super soft and comfortable. The sleeves are very form fitting, so I ordered a size up and was really happy. It came folded and vacuum sealed and surprisingly no wrinkles! Will recommend to my friends Read more
items.author: Rob

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but sleeves won’t stay in place
items.body: It’s a nice quality and a warm sweater but the sleeves rolls over all the time above the shoulder. I might have to stitch them somehow. Read more
items.author: PS

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars This sweater did not work for me, but the fabric was soft, stretchy and warm
items.body: It's not you it's me. I don't know how to wear off the shoulder things, so I think I may be the problem here. This sweater did not work for me, but the fabric was soft and warm, it holds its shape, and was of good quality. It has lots of stretch so you could likely size down to prevent bulkiness. For me, the top part kept rolling up and it looked more like a turtleneck than an off the shoulder item. again, this could be a personal problem. I was even so committed to making this work that I sewed the edges down to try and get it to fit properly, but then the whole thing just crept up to my neck, instead of just rolling upwards. you had to be there, but anyone who was this same struggle knows what the heck I'm talking about. The style is cute in the photos, I will try to remember that these type of tops don't work for me. Read more
items.author: Margot B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit
items.body: Fit very well. I kept having to pull the top part down it didn't stay down. And good comfy stretchy material. And it's warm. Read more
items.author: Queen AJ

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Returning
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This shirt was terrible. The shoulder thing required another person just to get it folded down and it would not stay. Every minute it rose up. I’m returning it. Very disappointed. Also runs small. This is not curvy friendly Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks amazing and mature
items.body: bought this for my gf and she looks amazing in it, and she loves it Read more
items.author: Aregowe

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't stay off the shoulders
items.body: I was disappointed with this shirt because the folded part does not stay put. It keeps popping up and throwing off the entire outfit. I've had it for about a year and haven't been able to wear it with anything because every time I try to wear it, I remember the fold doesn't stay put, and have to take it off again. Read more
items.author: Jaqualine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Khaki, Beige, Whiteblack, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
